column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was my first time trying deep dish pizza
column2: and boy was I surprised! The pizza was not as heavy as I expected it to be. We ordered the "Lou" vegetarian pizza
column3: and it was really tasty - not too cheesy
column4: and the crust was nice and not overly doughy/filling. It's definitely a different style of pizza to a traditional pizza
column5: but it's worth the try! I'll be back one day.
